alert.note: Alert for Edwards; Kiowa (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 14 at 7:15PM CDT until May 15 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL KIOWA AND SOUTHEASTERN EDWARDS COUNTIES... At 715 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Centerview, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fellsburg and Centerview. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
